<h3 id="X21872">X(21872)&nbsp;=&nbsp; (A,B,C,X(1); A',B',C',X(37)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(57), WHERE A'B'C' = ANTICEVIAN TRIANGLE OF X(37)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a (b + c) (3 a^2 - 2 a b - b^2 - 2 a c + 2 b c - c^2) : :
